entities
Class Room

java.lang.Object
  entities.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialRoom
public class Room
extends Object

Class Room - a room in an adventure game. This class is part of the "Go Sunset" application. "Go Sunset" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Room" represents one location in the scenery of the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. For each existing exit, the room stores a reference to the neighboring room.

Version:
2014.03.14
Author:
Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes, Louis Capitanchik, Joshua Mulcock, Alice Charterton, John Stones
